participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Michael is a supportive and enthusiastic individual, always encouraging his kids in their sports activities.
participant_1.background: coffee is my preferred beverage. i coach little league baseball. i have five sons. i drive a mini van. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Jessica is independent and adventurous, juggling her studies with a nightlife job while enjoying her freedom.
participant_2.background: i do not like chicken. i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.
